title: Apple and LG are reportedly collaborating on foldable iPad and MacBook OLED screens
content:
When it comes to releasing new technologies, Apple is famous for taking its sweet, sweet time. This ensures that the products it sells don’t feel like beta prototypes and aren’t as problematic as those sold by some other manufacturers. We’ve been seeing foldable phones for a few years now.
